channel.title: 功能模块 on Mynlp文档
channel.description: Recent content in 功能模块 on Mynlp文档

item.title: 拼音转换
item.description: 安装 Maven: <dependency> <groupId>com.mayabot.mynlp</groupId> <artifactId>mynlp-pinyin</artifactId> <version>3.x</version> </dependency> Gradle: compile 'com.mayabot.mynlp:mynlp-pinyin:3.x' 文字转拼音本质上是根据词典进行转换的，底层采用AhoCorasickDoubleArrayTrie进行高性能识别和转换

item.title: 文本摘要
item.description: 安装 Maven: <dependency> <groupId>com.mayabot.mynlp</groupId> <artifactId>mynlp-summary</artifactId> <version>3.x</version> </dependency> Gradle: compile 'com.mayabot.mynlp:mynlp-summary:3.x' API 文本摘要包含了两个简单TextRank的实现。 关键字摘要 KeywordSummary keywordSummary = new KeywordSummary(); keywordSummary.keyword("text",10); 句子摘要 SentenceSummary sentenceSummary = new SentenceSummary(); List<String> result = sentenceSummary.summarySentences(document, 10); KeywordSum

item.title: 繁简体转换
item.description: 安装 Maven: <dependency> <groupId>com.mayabot.mynlp</groupId> <artifactId>mynlp-transform</artifactId> <version>3.x</version> </dependency> Gradle: compile 'com.mayabot.mynlp:mynlp-transform:3.x' API Simplified2Traditional s2t = TransformService.simplified2Traditional(); s2t.transform("软件和体育的艺术"); 繁体转简体 Traditional2Simplified t2s = TransformService.traditional2Simplified(); t2s.transfo
